thread.title: Three-star recruit Frankie Hughes commits to Louisville amid scandal
thread.title_full: Three-star recruit Frankie Hughes commits to Louisville amid scandal

author: SI Wire
title: Three-star recruit Frankie Hughes commits to Louisville amid scandal
text:
Three-star recruit Frankie Hughes commits to Louisville amid scandal Sports Illustrated 21 hrs ago SI Wire © Sports Illustrated louisville scandal recruiting On the same day that more news broke regarding their player-bribing scandal, three-star recruit Frankie Hughes announced he has committed to play for the Louisville Cardinals.
AdChoices Hughes played high school basketball at Garfield Heights in Cleveland, Ohio, and had offers from Penn State, St. Joseph’s, Wisconsin and several others. He attended the same high school as current Cardinal Trey Lewis.
Hughes will join five-star recruit V.J. King in this year’s class for the Cardinals.
On Tuesday, five former Louisville players and recruits confirmed allegations that they attended parties that included escorts paid for by a former member of the basketball staff. One former player reportedly had sex with a danced after the staff member paid her.
Head coach Rick Pitino denied any involvement or knowledge of the situation in an interview on Tuesday.
- Kenny Ducey
Go to MSN Home
